about_the_game:
Unleash the Power of Metal with "Castle of Alchemists" Soundtrack Pack! Get ready to rock your gaming world with 16 electrifying metal tracks that'll set the stage for epic battles and adrenaline-pumping action. Dive into the pixelated tough vibe and feel the energy of every riff and rhythm.

The Castle Of Alchemists soundtrack was released in 1 volumes. This album consists of 16 tracks.
